The Authoring portlet is packaged in the _{noformat}authoring-apps.war{noformat}_ file. The portlet allows users to manage contents in draft and contents which need to be approved or published.

* *Available preferences* {anchor:id=CONTref.Portlets.Authoring.AvailablePreferences}

|| *Preference* || *Type*|| *Default*|| *Description* ||
| *repository* | {{String}} | {{Repository}} |The name of the repository.|
| *workspace* | {{String}} | {{Collaboration}} |The name of the workspace.|
| *drive* | {{String}} | {{Collaboration}} |The name of the drive.|


* *Sample Configuration* {anchor:id=CONTref.Portlets.Authoring.SampleConfiguration}

{code:xml}
<portlet-preferences>
  <preference>
    <name>repository</name>
    <value>repository</value>
    <read-only>true</read-only>
  </preference>
  <preference>
    <name>workspace</name>
    <value>collaboration</value>
    <read-only>false</read-only>
  </preference>
  <preference>
    <name>drive</name>
    <value>collaboration</value>
    <read-only>false</read-only>
  </preference>
</portlet-preferences>
{code}
